servinfosub.title: DTC Detecting Condition and Trouble Area

ptxt.emph: P1011: Cams Locking Pin Intake Bank 1 Low

entry.ptxt: CMP actuator (bank 1 / intake side) is not in parked position (the most retarded position) at engine starting.
(2 D/C detection logic but MIL does not light up)

ptxt.emph: P1012: Engine Position System Performance Bank 2

entry.ptxt: CMP actuator (bank 1 / exhaust side) is not in parked position (the most advanced position) at engine starting.
(2 D/C detection logic but MIL does not light up)

ptxt.emph: P1013: Cams Locking Pin Intake Bank 2 Low

entry.ptxt: CMP actuator (bank 2 / intake side) is not in parked position (the most retarded position) at engine starting.
(2 D/C detection logic but MIL does not light up)

ptxt.emph: P1014: Cams Locking Pin Exhaust Bank 2 Low

entry.ptxt: CMP actuator (bank 2 / exhaust side) is not in parked position (the most advanced position) at engine starting.
(2 D/C detection logic but MIL does not light up)

item.ptxt: If DTC other than aimed DTC are previously detected in DTC confirmation procedure, be sure to troubleshoot DTC previously detected.
Make sure that the following conditions are satisfied when using this procedure.

s1.ptxt: Run engine at idle speed for 1 min.

testgroup.question: Was “Engine and Emission Control System Check” performed?

action.ptxt: Go to Engine and Emission Control System Check:N32A .

testgroup.title: DTC recheck

test1.ptxt: Replace CMP actuator related to DTC.
Perform DTC confirmation procedure, and check DTC.

testgroup.question: Is DTC P1011, P1012, P1013 or P1014 still detected?

testgroup.title: Troubleshooting of other DTC(s) detected at the same time
testgroup.question: Is other DTC(s) detected together?

action.ptxt: Go to troubleshooting for applicable DTC.
Substitute a known-good ECM and recheck.
